name: hal-9000
description: Hellbound Claude Marketplace - MCP servers and productivity tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: hal-9000
plugins.description: Complete productivity suite: aod (Army of Darkness) multi-branch development, MCP servers (ChromaDB, Memory Bank, Sequential Thinking, DEVONthink), 12 custom agents, session management, terminal automation (tmux-cli), safety hooks, and ClaudeBox containerization. Everything you need in one plugin!
